SOLID, SLEEK DESIGN: Clean lines, electronic keypad and stainless steel with black glass construction provide elevated design
body.description: A space-saving microwave oven with plenty of cooking space, the GE� 0.7 Cu. Ft. Capacity Countertop Microwave Oven provides quality, convenience and style for any kitchen. The 700-watt oven, compact microwave fits easily on countertops while providing enough space and power to quickly cook popcorn, heat leftovers or defrost meats. Convenience cooking controls, defrost controls and Instant On one-touch controls make operation quick and easy. Stainless steel and clean lines bring understated sophistication to any kitchen d�cor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Workable alternative for the SpaceMaker II; decent basic microwave
reviews.reviewText: After many years of service, my GE SpaceMaker II microwave needed to be replaced. Unfortunately, the line has been discontinued by GE. They offer one model that's close to the dimensions, but the size would not work well for the space I have (built-in shelf). While there are lots of compact microwaves, the issue is the depth -- most are too deep to fit on a wall shelf.This has the proper depth for sitting on a shelf without issue provided that you use a flat pig-tail adapter so that the plug doesn't jut out and prevent the microwave from sitting close to the wall. The width is less than the nearly 24 inches of the SpaceMaker, but I filled the empty shelf space with a storage cannister that I found that matches the microwave.The microwave itself is a basic model that has few bells and whistles. I only use the microwave to reheat leftovers, and this does a fine job of that. Heating is even, and the 700W, while low powered compared with larger microwaves, gets the job done just fine. The controls are easy to use and are very similar to the SpaceMaker controls, which was a plus for me. The fit and finish are much better than other compact microwaves I looked at. It will fit a full-size dinner plate without issue.It's not a perfect replacement for the SpaceMaker, but it's a workable one. It provides good functionality as a basic compact microwave, looks much nicer than you would expect for the price point, and is easy to use. A very good value for the price, especially if you can catch it on a price dip. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, powerful, minimalistic
reviews.reviewText: I love the features and simplicity of this microwave. It just works and does so quite quietly compared to my previous microwaves. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well - very compact
reviews.reviewText: Keep in mind this is a low wattage microwave (it takes forever to hear something) but that’s the trade off for the compact size. If you want a more powerful microwave- get a bigger one . Love the fact that you can turn off the sound. Good value for the money. One minor issue (the buttons are not particularly responsive - you kind of have to put some pressure on them)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my semi truck and it works great! It fits perfect in the space provided in the truck and is not a big drain on the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars C’mon It’s The Cost of a couple Beers and Burgers
reviews.reviewText: My old microwave, manufactured in 2002, finally died. It was a tabletop, but I had built it into the cabinets to save counter space. It was less than 12” in height, so I needed another skinny one, or I had to rebuild my cabinets. It took forever to find one that one fit, but the fact that this is a GE, helped make the purchase. It is not as powerful as my old one, but it does a good job and looks good. A good value, even though Amazon raised it’s price by $20 bucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only had it 7 weeks. The return window is closed. At first it would quit working and I would unplug and worked great after that. Today used it and it went blank. Tried again unplugging it and it worked, then put it on for 6 minutes. It quit at 5 minutes and the outside got so hot . I unplugged it again and will throw it out for fear of causing a fire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I searched and searched for a microwave that would fit the shelf in my kitchen to replace an old one. Found this one and absolutely love it. Inside is big enough to fit a full size plate and the outside is sleek and has all the appropriate buttons, settings etc. I am really happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It has not been pick up yet
reviews.reviewText: To small and no one has pick it up yet
